Psychologists have known for many years that color can affect how people feel. For this reason,attention should be given to color schemes when decorating places such as offices and hospitals.
How true is this statement?How far does color influence people's health and capacity for work?
text: In Perú, there are many schools which are quite different. Between them, nowadays a few educative places have approached  an awesome learning level, but countless others have not gotten close to it even a little bit. Thus this immense difference could have been happening because of either a lack of good teachers or an absence of equipment. In the following text, we are going to assess whether the schools should use their budget to buy acceptable equipment or hire a better cadre.

On the one hand, we must concur about the fact that having good teachers is a part of the bedrock of all schools since ever. Remarkably this truth is based on that without a competent cadre any student could be guided properly even though they have the best technology. In the same way, school cadres do not work just as teachers, but also as examples for the future of society.

On the other hand, some electronic gadgets have become essential for almost all folk in countless situations. For instance, nowadays I am sure about the fact that no one could imagine a class without computers, microphones, internet, projectors, cell phones, etc. Furthermore, in my point of view, our electronic devices have turned into a part of ourselves. Therefore, if we had not used them, we would not be as today.

In conclusion, we must agree that both inversions outweigh innumerable other options because ,currently they are the base of any learning centre indeed. Besides, in my point of view, no one school could be  competitive if do not use electronic devices and hire fruitful staff.
